thread.title: Graphic Design Internship - Spring 2016 - Sports Marketing
thread.title_full: Graphic Design Internship - Spring 2016 - Sports Marketing

title: Graphic Design Internship - Spring 2016 - Sports Marketing
text: Posted/Updated: 10-21-2015 Brief Job Description: The intern will work with the company's leadership in developing a variety of graphic design needs including art for social media platforms, Client Media Reports, Media Guides, Presentations, Ads.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
